author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The goal of this PR is to add more diagnostics payload inspector comparison plots (a.k.a. geometry comparisons) in the Tracker Alignment payload inspector suite, by means of printing per layer and disk maps of the Δ of the various coordinates.

#### PR validation:

I've run the following script, testing the new classes added in this PR,

```bash
#!/bin/bash -ex

# Save current working dir so img can be outputted there later
W_DIR=$(pwd);

mkdir -p $W_DIR/compareAlignments
elements=(X Y Z Alpha Beta Gamma)

for i in "${elements[@]}"
do
    echo "Processing: $i coordinate"

    getPayloadData.py  \
	--plugin pluginTrackerAlignment_PayloadInspector \
	--plot plot_FPixAlignmentCompareMap${i}TwoTags \
	--tag SiPixelAliHLTHGCombined_PCL_v0_hlt \
	--input_params "{}" \
	--tagtwo TrackerAlignment_PCL_byRun_v0_hlt \
	--time_type Run \
	--iovs '{"start_iov": "392710", "end_iov": "392710"}' \
	--iovstwo '{"start_iov": "392278", "end_iov": "392278"}' \
	--db Prod \
	--test;

    mv *.png $W_DIR/compareAlignments/TrackerAlignmentCompare_FPix_${i}.png
    
    getPayloadData.py  \
	--plugin pluginTrackerAlignment_PayloadInspector \
	--plot plot_BPixAlignmentCompareMap${i}TwoTags \
	--tag SiPixelAliHLTHGCombined_PCL_v0_hlt \
	--input_params "{}" \
	--tagtwo TrackerAlignment_PCL_byRun_v0_hlt \
	--time_type Run \
	--iovs '{"start_iov": "392710", "end_iov": "392710"}' \
	--iovstwo '{"start_iov": "392278", "end_iov": "392278"}' \
	--db Prod \
	--test;

    mv *.png $W_DIR/compareAlignments/TrackerAlignmentCompare_BPix_${i}.png
    
done
```

and I obtained the plots available [here](https://marcomusich.web.cern.ch/Alignment/2025/PI/), such as:

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d9f0f6fa-d320-409d-84b4-36ca604847d9)
